titleStmt.title: A pleasant comedie, called VVily beguilde The chiefe actors be these: a poore scholler, a rich foole, and a knaue at a shifte.
Wily beguiled.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H[umphrey] L[ownes] for Clement Knight: and are to be solde at his shop, in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Holy Lambe,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop, in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Holy Lambe
